Different Crime.Crime Name: Submitting Incorrect Documentation for Immigration Purposes
procedural_fairness: No breach of procedural fairness occurred
regulatory_compliance: Regulations require points based on recognized credentials and years of study
evidence_assessment: Principal Applicant claimed 19 years of education but only had one recognized post-secondary diploma
decision_outcome: Application dismissed; no basis for judicial intervention

legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, SOR/2002-227
procedural_fairness: No breach of fairness occurred as the applicant was aware of regulatory requirements.
evidence_sufficiency: The Principal Applicant claimed 19 years of education but only had one recognized post-secondary diploma.
decision_outcome: Application dismissed; question certified regarding point allocation under Regulation 78(4).
